SEARCH
Module se1.bestellsystem
Package application

Class Application_D12

Object
Application_D12
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runtime.Runnable
public class Application_D12 extends Object implements Runtime.Runnable
Driver class for the d12-article/pricing assignment. Class creates Customer and Article objects and prints tables of objects.
Class implements the Runtime.Runnable interface.
Version:
"E12-1.0.0-SNAPSHOT"
Author:
"sgraupner"

      Parameters:
      order - to calculate VAT tax for
      Returns:
      VAT calculated for order
      Throws:

    • calculateOrderItemVAT

      Calculate the VAT included in an order item price uding method: calculateVAT(long grossValue, double taxRate).
      Parameters:
      item - to calculate VAT for
      pricing - Pricing to find VAT tax rate applicable to article
      Returns:
      VAT for ordered item
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - with null arguments

    • calculateIncludedVAT

      public long calculateIncludedVAT(long grossValue, double taxRate)
      Calculate the VAT tax included in a gross value based on a given tax rate (VAT is called "Mehrwertsteuer" (MwSt.) in Germany).
      Parameters:
      grossValue - value that includes VAT tax
      taxRate - applicable tax rate
      Returns:
      VAT tax included in gross value

    • fmtCustomerName

      public String fmtCustomerName(Customer customer, int... style)
      Format Customer name according to a format (0 is default): 
       style: 0: "Meyer, Eric"  10: "MEYER, ERIC"
        1: "Eric Meyer"   11: "ERIC MEYER"
        2: "Meyer, E."    12: "MEYER, E."
        3: "E. Meyer"     13: "E. MEYER"
        4: "Meyer"        14: "MEYER"
        5: "Eric"         15: "ERIC"
      Parameters:
      customer - Customer object
      style - name formatting style
      Returns:
      Customer name formatted according to the selcted style
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - with null arguments

    • fmtCustomerContacts

      public String fmtCustomerContacts(Customer customer, int... style)
      Format Customer contacts according to a format (0 is default): 
       style: 0: first contact: "anne24@yahoo.de"
        1: first contact with extension indicator: "anne24@yahoo.de, (+2 contacts)"
        2: all contacts as list: "anne24@yahoo.de, (030) 3481-23352, fax: (030)23451356"
      Parameters:
      customer - Customer object
      style - name formatting style
      Returns:
      Customer contact information formatted according to the selcted style

    • fmtPrice

      public String fmtPrice(long price, Pricing.Currency currency, int... style)
      Format long value to price according to a format (0 is default): 
       Example: long value: 499
 style: 0: "4.99"
        1: "4.99 EUR"     3: "4.99 €"
        2: "4.99EUR"      4: "4.99€"
      Parameters:
      price - long value as price
      currency - Pricing.Currency to obtain currency three-letter code or Unicode
      style - price formatting style
      Returns:
      price formatted according to selcted style

    • fmtDecimal

      public String fmtDecimal(long value, int decimalDigits, String... unit)
      Format long value to a decimal String with specified digit formatting: 
            {      "%,d", 1L },     // no decimal digits:  16,000Y
      { "%,d.%01d", 10L },
      { "%,d.%02d", 100L },   // double-digit price: 169.99E
      { "%,d.%03d", 1000L },  // triple-digit unit:  16.999-
      Parameters:
      value - value to format to String in decimal format
      decimalDigits - number of digits
      unit - appended unit as String
      Returns:
      decimal value formatted according to specified digit formatting
